meanings.definition: A condition caused by excessive intake of fluoride, characterized by discoloration and pitting of the teeth.
meanings.sent1: Fluoroses can lead to changes in the color and texture of teeth.
meanings.sent2: The dentist diagnosed the patient with fluoroses after noticing the tooth discoloration.
meanings.sent3: The tooth fairy avoided houses with fluoroses, fearing the colorful teeth.
meanings.sent4: Her smile resembled a field of fluoroses, with patches of different shades on each tooth.
meanings.sent5: The classroom poster vividly illustrated the effects of fluoroses on dental health.

meanings.sent1: The dentist discussed various fluoroses cases during the conference.
meanings.sent2: In the research study, they analyzed different types of fluoroses.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed a collection of fluoroses from around the world.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with fluoroses, each representing a unique dental condition.
meanings.sent5: The textbook included a chapter on managing fluoroses in dental practices.
